targets.expr: sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core"}[5m])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu",unit="core"}[5m])))

sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}[5m])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})) / sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",unit="byte"}[5m])))

panels.description: How much CPU is actually used in the cluster (CPU usage / Allocatable CPU).
panels.title: % Actual CPU Usage

panels.description: How much memory is actually used in the cluster (Memory usage / Allocatable Memory).
panels.title: % Actual Memory Usage

panels.description: How many requested cores are used (Actual CPU / Requested CPU).
panels.title: % Used Requested CPU

panels.description: How much requested memory is used (Actual Memory / Requested Memory).
panels.title: % Used Requested Memory

panels.description: Pods number in the cluster / Allocatable Pods.

targets.expr:
sum(((max by (pod, namespace)(kube_pod_container_status_running))==1) * on (pod, namespace) group_right() (kube_pod_info{}==1) 
) / sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="pods"}[5m])))

panels.title: % Pods Usage

panels.description:
This represents the total [CPU resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-cpu) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable CPU cores](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: Allocatable CPU

targets.expr: sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}[5m])) - on(node) (sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core"}[5m])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))

sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}[5m])) - on(node) (sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core"}[5m])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})))

panels.description: Difference between requested cores and used cores.

targets.expr: sum by (node) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD",container!=""}[5m]) - on (namespace,pod,container,node) group_left avg by (namespace,pod,container, node)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})) * -1 > 0

sum(sum by (node) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD",container!=""}[5m]) - on (namespace,pod,container,node) group_left avg by (namespace,pod,container, node)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})) * -1 > 0)

panels.title: Unused Requested CPU (Idle)

panels.description:
This represents the total [memory resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-memory) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable memory](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: Allocatable Memory

targets.expr: sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}[5m])) - on(node) (sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}[5m])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}))

sum(sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}[5m])) - on(node) (sum by (node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}[5m])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})))

panels.description: Difference between requested memory and used memory.
panels.title: Unused Requested Memory

targets.expr: topk(10, (sum by (namespace,pod,container)((rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace",container!="POD",container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) - on (namespace,pod,container) group_left avg by (namespace,pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}))) * -1 > 0)

topk(10, (sum by (namespace,pod,container)((rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace",container!="POD",container!=""}[2m])) - on (namespace,pod,container) group_left avg by (namespace,pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}))) > 0)
